sn36.16:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anandam bhagava etadavoca:
sn36.16:1.2: “katama nu kho, ananda, vedana, katamo vedanasamudayo, katamo vedananirodho, katama vedananirodhagamini patipada?
sn36.16:1.3: Ko vedanaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan”ti?
sn36.16:1.4: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu, bhante, bhagavantanneva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
sn36.16:1.5: “Tena hi, ananda, sunohi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
sn36.16:1.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
sn36.16:1.9: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn36.16:1.12: khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago patippassaddho hoti, doso patippassaddho hoti, moho patippassaddho hoti”ti.
